CohortConstructor 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    Introduction Building base cohorts Applying cohort restrictions Generate a matched age and sex cohort Cohort manipulations

    Function reference

    Build base cohorts

    conceptCohort()
    Create cohorts based on a concept set
    demographicsCohort()
    Create cohorts based on patient demographics

    Limit to an individualss first or last cohort entry

    requireIsFirstEntry()
    Restrict cohort to first entry by index date
    requireIsLastEntry()
    Restrict cohort to last entry by index date

    Impose date requirements on existing cohorts

    requireInDateRange()
    Require that an index date is within a date range

    Impose singular demographic requirements on existing cohorts

    requireAge()
    Restrict cohort on age
    requireFutureObservation()
    Restrict cohort on future observation
    requirePriorObservation()
    Restrict cohort on prior observation
    requireSex()
    Restrict cohort on sex

    Impose multiple demographic requirements on existing cohorts

    requireDemographics()
    Restrict cohort on patient demographics

    Impose requirements of presence or absence in other cohorts, concept sets, or table

    requireCohortIntersectFlag()
    Require cohort subjects are present in another cohort
    requireConceptIntersectFlag()
    Require cohort subjects to have events of a concept list
    requireTableIntersectFlag()
    Require cohort subjects are present in another table

    Impose presence or absence of a death record within a time window

    requireDeathFlag()
    Require cohort subjects' death at a certain time window

    Update cohort start and end dates

    exitAtDeath()
    Set cohort end date to death date
    exitAtFirstDate()
    Set cohort end date to the first of a set of column dates
    exitAtLastDate()
    Set cohort end date to the first of a set of column dates
    exitAtObservationEnd()
    Set cohort end date to end of observation
    trimDemographics()
    Restrict cohort on patient demographics
    trimToDateRange()
    Trim cohort dates to be within a date range

    Cohort manipulations

    erafy()
    Collapse cohort entries using a certain gap to concatenate records.
    intersectCohorts()
    Generate a combination cohort set between the intersection of different cohorts.
    matchCohorts()
    Generate a new cohort matched cohort from a preexisting target cohort. The new cohort will contain individuals not included in the target cohort with same year of birth (matchYearOfBirth = TRUE) and same sex (matchSex = TRUE).
    stratifyCohorts()
    Crate a new cohort table with the specified stratifications.
    subsetCohorts()
    Generate a cohort table using a subset of cohorts from another table.
    unionCohorts()
    Generate cohort from the union of different cohorts
    yearCohorts()
    Generate a new cohort table restricting cohort entries to certain years

    Mock data

    mockCohortConstructor()
    Function to create a mock cdm reference for CohortConstructor

    On this page
